author: Sponsored
title: Five PC games to play while you’re staying safe at home
description: Get your gaming fix with these five awesome PC games on the Omen 15
content: Staying at home during the coronavirus outbreak is the smartest thing you can do, but it could be a struggle to find things to do to stay occupied. Though the first half of the day can be spent on work-related tasks, the rest of the day can prove to be challe… [+3216 chars]
